label: regionID
comment: Unique identifier for the forestry region.

label: regionCode
comment: Unique code identifier for the forestry region.

label: regionDefiningAuthority
comment: Organization or authority that defines and manages the forestry region.

label: regionDefinition
comment: Detailed description of what the forestry region covers and its objectives.

label: regionState
comment: State to which the forest region belongs.

label: regionScope
comment: Scope of the forestry model ENUM: ["CENTRAL","STATE","PROJECT"]

label: regionSourceUri
comment: URI reference to the official source document or website for the forestry region.

label: regionStatus
comment: Current status of the forestry region ENUM: ["ACTIVE","RETIRED","MERGED"].

label: regionType
comment: Type of the forestry region ENUM: ["STATE","CIRCLE","DIVISION","RANGE","BEAT","BLOCK","COMPARTMENT","PLANTATION_SITE"]

label: regionValidFrom
comment: Date from which the forestry region is valid.

label: regionValidTill
comment: Date until which the forestry region is valid (null if currently valid).

label: parentID
comment: Unique identifier indicating the parent region in the spatial or administrative hierarchy

label: hierarchyLevel
comment: The level of the region within the broader organizational or geographic hierarchy.
